text: Trinity-Pawling School is an all-boys private boarding high school. It is in Pawling, New York. Trinity-Pawling was started in 1907, by Frederick Luther Gamage. The cost to attend is $51,000 a year. ==References== Category:High schools in New York (state) Category:1907 establishments in the United States Category:1900s establishments in New York (state)
title: Trinity-Pawling School
